name: blank
description: No effect.

name: human
description: Pair to Generate 2 {{science}}. Adds 1 to {{population}}. Can Work.

name: child
description: After 1 Spins, becomes a {{human}}. Can not Work.

name: berry bush
description: Dies when Worked. Generates 3 {{food}} on Death.

name: deer
description: Creates 2 {{meat}} on Death.

name: hare
description: Creates 1 {{meat}} on Death.

name: wolf
description: Wounds Touching {{human}}. Removes Touching {{child}} {{deer}} {{hare}} {{meat}} {{pig}} {{sheep}}. Creates 2 {{meat}} on Death.

name: boar
description: Wounds Touching {{human}}. Creates 2 {{meat}} on Death.

name: bear
description: Wounds Touching {{human}}. Removes Touching {{child}} {{deer}} {{hare}} {{meat}}. Creates 3 {{meat}} on Death.

name: mammoth
description: Wounds Touching {{human}}. Creates 4 {{meat}} on Death.

name: rock
description: Generates 8 {{production}} on Death.

name: tree
description: Generates 2 {{food}} and 1 {{production}} when Worked. Generates 4 {{food}}, 4 {{production}} and Creates 1-3 {{log}} and 1-2 {{sapling}} on Death.

name: sapling
description: After 3 Spins, becomes a {{tree}}.

name: wood
description: Generates 8 {{production}} on Death.

name: coal
description: Dies when Touching {{torch}} {{campfire}}. Generates 10 {{production}} on Death.

name: torch
description: Protects {{human}} {{child}} when Worked.

name: campfire
description: Generates 5 {{science}} when Worked. Replaces Touching {{meat}} to {{meal}} when Worked.

name: meat
description: Dies when Worked. Generates 5 {{food}} on Death.

name: boulder
description: Generates 2 {{production}} when Worked. Generates 4 {{production}} and Creates 1-3 {{rock}} on Death.

name: axe
description: Kills Touching {{tree}} {{log}} when Worked.

name: log
description: Generates 2 {{production}} when Worked. Generates 4 {{production}} and Creates 1-3 {{wood}} on Death.

name: pickaxe
description: Kills Touching {{rock}} {{boulder}} when Worked.

name: sling
description: Kills Random {{hare}} {{deer}} {{wolf}} {{boar}} {{bear}} {{mammoth}} when Worked.

name: spear
description: Kills Touching {{hare}} {{deer}} {{wolf}} {{boar}} {{bear}} {{mammoth}} when Worked.

name: canoe
description: Generates 5 {{science}} when Touching {{blank}}. Kills Touching {{fish}} when Worked.

name: meal
description: Dies when Worked. Generates 15 {{food}} on Death.

name: fish
description: Creates 3 {{meat}} on Death.

name: pig
description: Creates 3 {{meat}} on Death.

name: sheep
description: Generates 5 {{production}} when Worked. Creates 2 {{meat}} on Death.

name: cow
description: Generates 2 {{food}} when Worked. Creates 5 {{meat}} on Death.

name: family
description: 3 {{human}} Elements Merge to form a {{family}}. Works touching Elements. Worked Elements give x1.5. Generates 3 {{science}} and costs 5 {{food}} when spun.

name: hut
description: 5 {{family}} Elements merge to form a {{hut}}. Kills Touching {{hare}} {{deer}} {{wolf}} {{bear}} {{mammoth}} {{rock}} {{boulder}} {{meat}} {{tree}} {{log}}. Works touching Elements. Worked and Killed Elements give x2. Generates 12 {{science}} and costs 20 {{food}} when spun.

name: tribe
description: 5 {{hut}} Elements merge to form a {{tribe}}. Kills Touching {{hare}} {{deer}} {{wolf}} {{bear}} {{mammoth}} {{rock}} {{boulder}} {{meat}} {{tree}} {{log}}. Works touching Elements. Worked and Killed Elements give x3. Generates 70 {{science}} and costs 125 {{food}} when spun.
